Marketo is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Marketo integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: Client ID Client Secret REST Endpoint Identity Endpoint To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Marketo To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Marketo account. Click on the Admin option in the top nav bar and select LaunchPoint under Integration in the side menu . Click on New > New Service option. Enter the Display Name for your application, select Service as Custom , give it a description, select the user in API Only User and click on Create . Select the Custom_app created and click on View Details . Copy the Client ID and Client Secret of the user. Click on Web Services under Integration in the side menu > Scroll down to REST API section and copy the REST Endpoint and Identity . The Linked Account or end-user now have all the credentials required to connect with Marketo.
